name: viewport-mercator-project
description: Convert to and from lat/lng and pixels in web mercator at arbitrary floating point zoom levels.
author: Uber Technologies, Inc.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-es6
scripts.build-es5: mkdir -p dist && babel src --out-dir dist --modules=transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build-es6: mkdir -p dist-es6 && babel src --out-dir dist-es6 --source-maps inline
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-node
